tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Honestly,  we are very lucky to meet Dr Durga Vytla. She is so supportive, throughout the treatment she was very caring. Her expertise are too good in pregnancy related issues. I had a lot of troubles related to uterus.l and getting pregnant.  She has done a marvellous job and today we got the news that we are going to have twins. Hospital staff mainly madinaguda staff is very very cooperative and attentive. I never had even a single moment where I felt that no one cared about us, not even telephonically. I thank all of them with my whole heart.
Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
In 10 years of my marriage life we visited so many Hospitals and had IUI and IVF treatments, but No success, After that we visited Hegde Hospital in June 2021. Hegde was excellent at understanding the problems that we faced earlier. Dr Durga vytla Madam is very friendly and explained issues very clearly. Madam did a couple of tests and suggested the correct approach and medicare with which treatment we were comfortable. We choose IUI Treatment and started in the first week of July 2021. We conceived in our 1st IUI cycle. Now I am a third month pregnant. Thank you so much, madam. Dr Durga vytla Madam treating me very well.

Heartfelt Thanks to Dr DURGA VYTLA madam and Front Office Staff and Nurses. I can say that this Miyapur branch Hegde hospital has got the best people at their Hospitals

I went to the Hegde from past four months for pre pragnancy checkups, staff were so good they responding even in weekends.
I had severe stomach pain and consulted Durga vytla mam in an emergency situation during the weekend. She responded immediately and provided the medication. Her way of treatment, explanation of any issue was too good. You can consult her for any gynec problems.

Thank you so much mam for the quick response.

review: I'm very happy that I'm become pregnant since I'm trying from 3years and i hare confirmed now by Durga vytla,I have taken natural treatment for 3 to4 months but it doesn't work and Dr Durga vytla took another step by iui treatment which I confirm for first attempt.hospital staff also helped me to explain in a clear manner.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My wife was suffering from PCOD from the last 7 years. We consulted many doctors in many hospitals but did not get any positive result. Under the expert treatment of Dr Durga vytla, my wife could finally conceive. The doctor gave us complete information at every stage of the treatment. We are very much thankful to Dr Durga vytla and entire team of Hegde hospital for supporting us at every stage of treatment. Thank you very much Dr Durga Vytla.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We would like to offer our heartfelt gratitude to Dr Durga Vytla. Right from the first day we visited her in July 2020, she was absolutely clear of her approach. it was made very clear to us as well. We were very much in sync with what to expect next. Nothing about the treatment was unclear or unexpected. Very happy with the transparent attitude which doctor had all the while. Hospital staff deserves a big applause as the steps to reach the doctor are very methodical and staff is always available to address the queries. very friendly. I actually felt for them as my friends. Big thanks goes to Andrology lab experts. Their efficiency in processing the sample made a big contribution in the success of our IUI right in first attempt. Overall anyone would be delighted to visit the Hegde fertility Miyapur branch. And conception is a miracle as the punch line of hospital says and this miracle happens at Hegde. Tons of thanks again to each and everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was wonderful experience for me when I met Dr Durga Vytla madam after treatment from various places. She has given me a new ray of hope and due to her great support and utmost care I am now pregnant. Ma'am, Injection nursing staff Shara, Bhavani and all those whom name I don't know are very supportive. Ma'am listen to the patient very patiently and give best advice. Hospital is also very neat and clean. I strongly recommend Dr Durga Vytla madam and Hegde fertility for best fertility treatment.

review:

We are glad that have came to HEGDE HOSPITAL. Staff members in Hegde Hospital took at most care during our stressful IVF journey & helped us every moment whenever needed. We also benifited from acupuncture sessions which is a added advantage and helpful factor for our pregnancy.

Once again, We Thank each and every one of you as a Hegde Hospital Team. You people are rocking and making millions of people's dream come true. Conception. A Miracle. A Science. You people are striving to make it happen. Thank you.
